Detailed Description

A subclass of AlertBox that can display a time picker area.

The following example demonstrates how to use the TimePickerBox. 

  //Create your TimePickerBox in your page
  SamplePage : public Page {
    public:
      TimePickerBox* mpTimePickerBox;
      int32_t mHour;
      int32_t mMin;
      SamplePage();
      virtual ~SamplePage();
      virtual void onInit(Persistence* p);
      virtual void onTear();
      void createTimePickerBox();
  };

  SamplePage::createTimePickerBox() {
    // initial member
    mHour = 7;
    mMin = 30;

    // new TimePickerBox instance
    mpTimePickerBox = new TimePickerBox(this);

    if (mpTimePickerBox != NULL) {
      // set TimePickerBox cancelable
      mpTimePickerBox->setCancelable(true);

      // update time picker
      mpTimePickerBox->updateTime(mHour, mMin);

      // showing TimePickerBox
      Scene* scene = getSceneSingleton();
      if (scene != NULL) {
        scene->showDialog(mpTimePickerBox);
      }
    }
  }
